contentrichtext.text: {{italic title}} {{Taxobox | name = ''Kentropyx'' | image = Kentropyx calcarata.jpg | image_caption = ''Kentropyx calcarata'' | regnum = [[Animal]]ia | phylum = [[Chordata]] | subphylum = [[Vertebrata]] | classis = [[Reptilia]] | ordo = [[Squamata]] | subordo = [[Lacertilia]] | infraordo = [[Scincomorpha]] | familia = [[Teiidae]] | genus = '''''Kentropyx''''' | genus_authority = | subdivision_ranks = [[Species]] | subdivision = 9 species, ''see text.'' }} '''Kentropyx''' is a whiptail lizard [[genus]] which belongs to the [[family (biology)|family]] ([[Teiidae]]). There are nine species in this genus. ==Selected species== Listed alphabetically.<ref>[http://reptile-database.reptarium.cz/advanced_search?genus=Kentropyx&exact%5B0%5D=genus&submit=Search ''Kentropyx''], The Reptile Database</ref> *''[[Kentropyx altamazonica]]'' <small>(Cope, 1876)</small> *''[[Kentropyx borckiana]]'' <small>(Peters, 1869)</small> – Guyana Kentropyx *''[[Kentropyx calcarata]]'' <small>Spix, 1825</small> – Striped Forest Whiptail *''[[Kentropyx lagartija]]'' <small>Gallardo, 1962</small> *''[[Kentropyx paulensis]]'' <small>(Boettger, 1893)</small> – Boettger's Kentropyx *''[[Kentropyx pelviceps]]'' <small>(Cope, 1868)</small> – Forest Whiptail<!-- Boletim do Museu Paraense Emílio Goeldi 15: 181 --> *''[[Kentropyx striata]]'' <small>(Daudin, 1802)</small> *''[[Kentropyx vanzoi]]'' <small>Gallagher & Dixon, 1980</small> – Gallagher's Kentropyx *''[[Kentropyx viridistriga]]'' <small>(Boulenger, 1894)</small> – Green Kentropyx ==References== {{refs}} [[Category:Teiidae]] {{Lizard-stub}}
